channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache ServiceComb Service-Center
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache ServiceComb Service-Center

item.title: CVE-2023-44312|2024-01-31T08:49:12.741Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20servicecomb%20service-center
item.description:
Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor in Apache ServiceComb Service-Center.This issue affects
Apache ServiceComb Service-Center
before 2.1.0 (include).
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.2.0, which fixes the issue.

item.title: CVE-2023-44313|2024-01-31T08:49:45.962Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20servicecomb%20service-center
item.description:
Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Apache ServiceComb Service-Center. Attackers can obtain sensitive server information through specially crafted requests.This issue affects Apache ServiceComb before 2.1.0(include).
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.2.0, which fixes the issue.
